head.title: Thirteenth Test of Module 15 of CSS3 Spec

body.h1: Testing Thirteenth Testable Statement of Module 15 of CSS3 Specification

ul.li: 13. CSS3 paged media (float: gutter-side/fore-edge side) has rules applied in a certain order.

body.p: If statement #13 above is passed, then this paragraph should be in the initial containing block and red. The rule applied is "#body1 {position: absolute; left: 220px; top: 220px }". "#body1" is applied to "BODY" and "#p1" is applied to "p". Also "#p1 {color: red}".

This emphasized text (blue) covers the first two sentences of the paragraph. Rules are "#em1 {color: blue}", "#strong1 {color: yellow}", and "#p2 {color: green}".
This strong text is yellow. This part of paragraph should be green. "#em1" is applied to "em", "#p2" is applied to "p", and "#strong1" is applied to "strong".
All other properties of this page should be UA-default.
